DOC.brief_summary: MNTX 1109 is a single center, open label study, composed of normal healthy adult subjects to evaluate the PK of MNTX and its metabolites administered once daily as a subcutaneous (SC) injection for a period of seven days. Blood samples will be obtained at screening and for drug concentration data.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics (PK) of Methylnaltrexone (MNTX) in Healthy Adult Subjects
